Title: 150yrs 44mm Chopard men's wristwatch original Swiss antique silver chronometer
Description: Case: Case material : solid silver 0.800 purity Case have Louis Ulysse Chopard hallmarks Case after carefully polishing. Size 44 mm, lug width: 22 mm Crystal: mineral glass NOSWinding crown with rolled gold.Solid silver case, adorned with engraved and guilloche decoration. Inside, the case is punched with the number « 15370 », with the silver punchmark (0.800) and the typical beehive from L.U.C.The dust cover is highly decorated with medals from universal and international exhibitions (the six medals on top) : Zurich, Genève, Anvers 1885, 1896, 1883.Movement: Hand-winding mechanical movement, with the beehive punch mark (typical of L.U.C movements), the "+déposé" (patent L.U.C) punch mark and a serial number. Movement in mint condition, sets and runs perfect and keeping good time. Winding perfect and has 40 hours power reserve. Dial: White dial in good condition with black Roman numerals, with gold color hands.Bracelet/strap: Genuine leather watch strapLug width 22 mm Please see all images and video.
